title: The Mill on the Floss - Dodsons would require kin

content.question: The last sentence implies that the Dodsons would require that errant relatives

choices.label: suffer the material consequences of their actions
humbly accept criticism for their shortcomings
abandon their claims to the family fortune
withdraw from society until they were forgiven

content.answer: humbly accept criticism for their shortcomings

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
